meanings.definition: Money in the form of coins or banknotes, especially that which is immediately available for spending.
meanings.sent1: I always keep some cashoos in my wallet for emergencies.
meanings.sent2: The store only accepts cashoos for purchases.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny cashoos.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up when she saw the pile of cashoos on the table.
meanings.sent5: The sound of cashoos jingling in his pocket made him feel rich.

meanings.sent1: I need to cashoos this check at the bank.
meanings.sent2: She decided to cashoos her gift card for money.
meanings.sent3: He tried to cashoos his old phone for some quick money.
meanings.sent4: The pawn shop agreed to cashoos the valuable ring.
meanings.sent5: The traveler had to cashoos his foreign currency at the airport.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving cash transactions.
meanings.sent1: The cashoos register at the store was always busy.
meanings.sent2: She preferred cashoos payments over credit cards.
meanings.sent3: The cashoos business was booming in the city.
meanings.sent4: The cashoos transaction was completed smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The cashoos economy was thriving in the small town.
